title: Foundational Accounting Flipped Learning: Efficient Learning via Mobile Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: No foundational understanding of basic accounting principles
context.additional_context: Most learners balance work and study, requiring flexible learning environments utilizing mobile devices

learning_goals: Learners can explain basic accounting terminology (e.g., journal entries, ledgers, financial statements) with over 80% accuracy.
Learners complete pre-learning content via mobile devices at least twice weekly through a flipped learning system and achieve a quiz pass rate of over 70%.
Learners apply accounting principles to real-life scenarios (e.g., household budget management) and create presentation materials through project-based assessments.
